enhanced_by.reason: The resolveRef method relies on the getMap method to retrieve the appropriate map from the Components object, which is essential for resolving the reference.
The resolveRef method uses the getRefName method to extract the reference name from the provided ref string, which is crucial for locating the correct component.
The getBaseRefForType method constructs a base reference string that is similar to the reference string used in resolveRef, which can help in constructing assertions for the resolved reference.
The getMap method returns a map that is directly used in resolveRef to retrieve the referenced component, making it useful for asserting the correctness of the resolved reference.
